IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: JCC Rockland is a not-for-profit organization dedicated to the enrichment and continuity of Jewish life and to the preservation of Jewish heritage.
IRS990.MissionDesc: JCC Rockland is a not-for-profit organization dedicated to the enrichment and continuity of Jewish life and to the preservation of Jewish heritage.
IRS990.Desc: Full Day Early Childhood ProgramThe Deborah Koenig Early Childhood Center provides full day Early Childhood for infants as young as six weeks old through children in our four year old program. During last year, the school ended with around 120 children in 11 classrooms.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: Youth Sports The sports program this year included more than 250 children playing basketball, primarily at the JCC. Additionally, the sports program focused on mini sports for preschool aged children and those in grades 1-2. These programs also took place at the JCC.Day CampJCC runs a a full summer camp program at the JCC for young children of the age of 2 though teens. Children at our youngest preschool camp J Land typically attend for 4 or 8 weeks. Children elementary school age and older attend for typically 2-8 weeks. Under the brand of JCC Camps we provide Camp Discover, Summer STEM, J Teens, and a CIT program.In the summer of 2023, JCC Camps enrollment was its highest in history. As many as 575 campers attended camp on a weekly basis

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: The major programs offered by the JCC include:Fitness Center A fully equipped center was offered to approximately 2,200 members during the fiscal year. Floor trainers staff the center for basic instruction and supervision at all times and certified personal trainers are available by appointment.Seniors More than 800 Seniors particupate in programming at the Chazen Senior Center. Each week, Monday through Friday the programming includes educational events, lectures, outdoor concerts, clubs, fitness and other activities in a congenial enviroment.Additionally, our adult life members participate in local trips.Film FestivalThe JCC Rockland International Jewish Film Festial operated this year for the 21st year. The movies were shown virtually and back in the theatres.

OtherAssetsOrgGrp.Desc: operting lease right of use assets

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES 4: Full Day Early Childhood ProgramThe Deborah Koenig Early Childhood Center provides full day Early Childhood for infants as young as six weeks old through children in our four year old program. During last year, the school ended with around 120 children in 11 classrooms.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Line 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THERE ARE TWO BOARD MEMBERS THAT ARE HUSBAND AND WIFE

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF THE 990 WAS PROVIDED TO THE AUDIT COMMITTEE MEMBERS OF THE BOARD FOR THEIR REVIEW AND APPROVAL PRIOR TO FILING WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY REQUIRES A STATEMENT TO BE SIGNED ANNUALLY BY ALL BOARD MEMBERS. STATEMENTS ARE THEN REVIEWED BY AN INDIVIDUAL FOR POTENTIAL CONFLICTS. ACTIONS ARE TAKEN TO RESOLVE CONFLICTS, IF ANY EXIST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15a
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT CURRENTLY HAVE AN EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION POLICY. HOWEVER, THE ANNUAL SALARY OF THE CEO IS REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT CURRENTLY HAVE AN EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION POLICY. HOWEVER, ALL ANNUAL SALARIES ARE REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATIONS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND TAX RETURNS ARE AVAILBLE UPON WRITTEN REQUEST TO THE CEO AT THE ORGANIZATION'S ADDRESS.
